oai_dc:dc.dc:title: On 2-coloring certain k-uniform hypergraphs
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: VISHWANATHAN, S
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We give some sufficient conditions for the existence of a 2-coloring for k-uniform hypergraphs. When the number of edges equals the size of the base set of the hypergraph, these conditions are based on the pemanent of the incidence matrix. (C) 2003 Elsevier Science (USA). .
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF COMBINATORIAL THEORY SERIES A, 101(1), 168-172
